be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers

Class EditProjectController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers.EditProjectController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EditProjectViewController.ViewListener

    public class EditProjectController
extends java.lang.Object
implements EditProjectViewController.ViewListener
    Handle the logic of editing a project This class is the listener of the EditProjectViewController.ViewListener.
    This will manage the interaction on the EditProjectView.fxml view.

        Create a project with all information filled by user, if all required information are given. Otherwise an error message is shown to the user. Once a project is correctly created, it is added to the database.
